LanguageData.SlabChair.label: 板椅
LanguageData.SlabChair.description: Whoever said that stone is not comfortable? Prove everyone wrong with this replica of a perfectly comfortable stony chair.

LanguageData.FoldingStool.label: 折叠凳
LanguageData.FoldingStool.description: A piece of leather and some steel - et voilà! An ingenious way of sitting, invented by the Galga Ler on Achron V.

LanguageData.RusticCouch.label: 普通沙发
LanguageData.RusticCouch.description: A couch is the ultimate furniture piece for sitting satisfaction. Relaxing on it won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

LanguageData.ClutterCouchA.label: 沙发
LanguageData.ClutterCouchA.description: A couch is type of furniture that could be suitable for two, but is usable by only one. It won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

LanguageData.ClutterLocker.label: 寄物柜
LanguageData.ClutterLocker.description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.

LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Blueprint_Install.label: locker (蓝图)

LanguageData.ClutterLocker_Frame.description: A locker that can store a set clothing for easy outfit swapping. A colonist can be assigned ownership of this locker. It comes with dust contractor unit for that good, ancient feeling.
LanguageData.Commode.label: 抽屉小柜
LanguageData.Commode.description: A place for colonist to store personal belongings. When placed with a bed it will increase comfort and rest effectiveness slightly. Up to 5 items.
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint.label: commode (蓝图)
LanguageData.Commode_Blueprint_Install.label: commode (蓝图)
LanguageData.Commode_Frame.label: commode (建造中)

LanguageData.Storage_Locker.description: Haulers carry apparel here for storage. Up to 5 items.

LanguageData.EndTable.label: 带灯床头柜
LanguageData.EndTable.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.

LanguageData.EndTable_Blueprint_Install.label: end table with lamp (蓝图)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.label: end table with lamp (建造中)
LanguageData.EndTable_Frame.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.
LanguageData.JournalTable.label: 杂志桌
LanguageData.JournalTable.description: A decorative table with a journal on it. Colonists can gather here to discuss the majestic journal and the mighty steed that is the table that it rests upon.
LanguageData.JournalTable_Blueprint.label: journal table (蓝图)
LanguageData.JournalTable_Blueprint_Install.label: journal table (蓝图)
LanguageData.JournalTable_Frame.label: journal table (建造中)
